00012 
00013 // Subclasses of Species 
00014 #include "Point.h"
00015 #include "Homopolymer.h"
00016 #include "Diblock.h"
00017 #include "HomoRing.h"
00018 #include "HomopolymerSG.h"
00019 
00020 namespace McMd
00021 {
00022 
00023    using namespace Util;
00024 
00025    /* 
00026    * Return a pointer to a instance of Species subclass speciesName.
00027    */
00028    Species* SpeciesFactory::factory(const std::string &className) const
00029    {
00030       Species *ptr = 0;
00031 
00032       ptr = trySubfactories(className);
00033       if (ptr) return ptr;     
00034 
00035       // Try explicit class names
00036       if (className == "Species") {
00037          ptr = new Species();
00038       } else
00039       if (className == "Point") {
00040          ptr = new Point();
00041       } else
00042       if (className == "Homopolymer") {
00043          ptr = new Homopolymer();
00044       } else
00045       if (className == "Diblock") {
00046          ptr = new Diblock();
00047       } else
00048       if (className == "HomoRing") {
00049          ptr = new HomoRing();
00050       } else 
00051       if (className == "HomopolymerSG") {
00052          ptr = new HomopolymerSG();
00053       } 
00054       return ptr;
00055    }
00056 
00057 }
00058 #endif
